#summary How to configure Glucose for use with GL

= Running Glucose =

I've had a couple people ask me this, so I'm making a wiki page on it (ideally this would go in the GL documentation somewhere, but this is a start).  

To get Glucose 3.0 to work with GL, you need to pass in the "-model" flag to it.  Also, many of us that use Glucose use the version in the "simp" directory, which includes a simplifier (as opposed to the "core" directory, which does not).

This can be achieved by creating a "glucose" script and passing in the "-model" flag and arguments (perhaps with "$@")
